data.name: Sheba: A New Dawn
data.detailed_description:
In the Time Before, when the maps of today were not yet drawn, humans bordered upon lands bright and strange. Lands filled with peoples and creatures the likes of which no one now can imagine. Sheba is the closest human kingdom to the realm of the jinn. Jinn are creatures possessing magical powers that no man can wield.


Jinn possession is a powerful tool used by the Jinn higher ranks to control life in our world. The possessions shaped the world of Sheba and affected its nature. Many battles have been fought in a war between two realms, the human and the Jinn, which never found peace. The shepherd Enar is destined to fight the next decisive battle, A New Dawn. Enar's journey begins when a prisoner jinn, called Mirah, escaped and flipped his life upside down.

Key Features:



  • Iconic and memorable characters: Each character has a vital role in the story which you will never forget!
  • Story and cutscenes: Enjoy the fully voice casted compelling story!


  • 45+ Combo skills and elemental combo finishers: be stylish by using various skills and combos with each different elemental sword to enjoy your battles ahead!


  • 67+ unique Jinn and bosses: each Jinn and boss are inspired by nature and mythical stories. They have their own strategic fighting styles which will reward you with unique collectables to power your journey!


  • Unique puzzles: Mind games are set by the Jinn to prevent adventurers from unlocking the secrets of the world.


  • Collect various power ups and abilities: Enjoy your journey through secret places in the world of Sheba to unlock new abilities and grind rare gems to become more powerful to beat your foes.


  • Different environments: The land of Sheba is filled with distinct places to explore and discover.


  • Customize your fighting style with RPG elements: Level up your character to increase your stats and play the game the way you like!

data.short_description: Sheba: A New Dawn is an action adventure metroidvania game that takes you through a compelling story of revenge and despair. Fight your way through the next decisive battle, A New Dawn. Explore the world of Sheba and the corruption of Jinn possessions.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic*, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 280X / GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300 / Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 290 / GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
